title: Kansen 2: Inzai Toshi
synopsis: Kansen 2 (like the first episode) takes place during the initial outbreak of the Unknown virus epidemic, but the protagonists here have a much harder lot because they are stuck in the middle of a contaminated city immediately after its destruction by a mysterious cataclysm.
staff: [['Yamamoto, Toshiyuki', ['Producer']], ['Yokoyama, Hiromi', ['Director']], ['Kinohara, Hikaru', ['Character Design']], ['Lee, Si-Min', ['Animation Director']]]
